Source: Girls can roll it up and use it as a sword. (By Kyousuke)

Target: Guys can use it the way they would smack flies. (By Kyousuke)

Target: Do you want to drink undiluted Calpis that bad? It's clear from the way you bat.

Source: Thinking about undiluted Calpis again? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: Thinking about undiluted Calpis again? It's clear from the way you bat.

Source: I didn't know you were so into undiluted Calpis, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.
Target: I didn't know you were so into undiluted Calpis, Riki. It's totally clear from the way you bat.

Source: "Give it a rest already. You should mix it with some water."
Target: "Give it a rest already. You should mix it with some water."

Source: Incredible... Never expected to find such a raw diamond here.
Target: Incredible... Never expected to find such a raw diamond here.

Source: If you keep playing baseball, you can even aim for the pros...
Target: If you keep playing baseball, you can even aim for the pros...

Source: Eight! Am I witnessing a miracle!?
Target: Eight! Am I witnessing a miracle!?

Source: Weren't you born to play baseball!?
Target: Weren't you born to play baseball!?

Source: Why are you wasting your time here, you have some serious talent!
Target: Why are you wasting your time here, you have some serious talent!

Source: Ten... What the hell are you!?
Target: Ten... What the hell are you!?

Source: You can even beat the pros as you are now!
Target: You can even beat the pros as you are now!

Source: That's enough, I already understand well how great you are.
Target: That's enough, I already understand well how great you are.

Source: Twelve, you're a God of Batting!
Target: Twelve, you're a God of Batting!

Source: That's enough, you are doing great.
Target: That's enough, you are doing great.

Source: It was just a small compliment, don't get carried away!
Target: It was just a small compliment, don't get carried away!

Source: Just how good are you at sports?
Target: Just how good are you at sports?

Source: I didn't mean to aim at you, but I hope you now understand how the cats felt.
Target: I didn't mean to aim at you, but I hope you now understand how the cats felt.

Source: That ball was from the cats.
Target: That ball was from the cats.

Source: It's not like I'm aiming at you!
Target: It's not like I'm aiming at you!

Source: Was it me!? Was it my fault!?
Target: Was it me!? Was it my fault!?

Source: I didn't mean to do that!!
Target: I didn't mean to do that!!

Source: They'll start avoiding me because of you!
Target: They'll start avoiding me because of you!

Source: How many times does this make!?
Target: How many times does this make!?

Source: How many times does that make!
Target: How many times does that make!

Source: Do you have unpleasant memories with cats, or what!?
Target: Do you have unpleasant memories with cats, or what!?

Source: Stop venting your anger on cats!
Target: Stop venting your anger on cats!

Source: Is that your idea of fun!?
Target: Is that your idea of fun!?

Source: Do you have unpleasant memories with cats, or what!
Target: Do you have unpleasant memories with cats, or what!

Source: Ha ra ho ro hi ree...
Target: Ha ra ho ro hi ree...

Source: Today just became my catching anniversary day.
Target: Today just became my catching anniversary day.

Source: Ichiro-san threw a laser beam in the pasture.
Target: Ichiro-san threw a laser beam in the pasture.

Source: The throwing method directly taught by Kyousuke-san!
Target: The throwing method directly taught by Kyousuke-san!

Source: Do you know why baseballs are white?
Target: Do you know why baseballs are white?

Source: Maybe you should consider switching to some other sport.
Target: Maybe you should consider switching to some other sport.

Source: Won't you hit a ❛Terrifying: the Vanishing Ball❜ or something, sometimes?
Target: Won't you hit a ❛Terrifying: the Vanishing Ball❜ or something, sometimes?

Source: At least try to get it past the infield.
Target: At least try to get it past the infield.

Source: Suro-ingu! Aimu suro-inga-... That's so hard to pronounce...
Target: Suro-ingu! Aimu suro-inga-... That's so hard to pronounce...

Source: Haruchin Unlimited Ultra Super Dynamic Miracle Hyper Ultimate Global Excellent Delicious Bombard Power Throwing!!
Target: Haruchin Unlimited Ultra Super Dynamic Miracle Hyper Ultimate Global Excellent Delicious Bombard Power Throwing!!

Source: I'll get it, I'll get it～.
Target: I'll get it, I'll get it～.

Source: This isn't the majors, you know.
Target: This isn't the majors, you know.

Source: Well, there are days like this too.
Target: Well, there are days like this too.

Source: Every dog has its day, as the saying goes...
Target: Every dog has its day, as the saying goes...

Source: Do you hold a grudge against me or something...
Target: Do you hold a grudge against me or something...

Source: This time, wasn't it clearly its own fault!?
Target: This time, wasn't it clearly its own fault!?

Source: You could've dodged that just now...
Target: You could've dodged that just now...

Source: Naive! How many years have you been batting!?
Target: Naive! How many years have you been batting!?

Source: That can't be all you've got, can it!?
Target: That can't be all you've got, can it!?

Source: I always thought you were a lot better than that!
Target: I always thought you were a lot better than that!

Source: This is no time to be sitting around!
Target: This is no time to be sitting around!

Source: Didn't we make a promise! Though I forgot what it was already!
Target: Didn't we make a promise! Though I forgot what it was already!

Source: It was supposed to be a promise between just the two of us, though I already told everyone!
Target: It was supposed to be a promise between just the two of us, though I already told everyone!

Source: You were hungry back then. You were kinda fat though.
Target: You were hungry back then. You were kinda fat though.

Source: You should starve some more, starve s-o-m-e more...
Target: You should starve some more, starve s-o-m-e more...

Source: You want to come back home as a hero, don't you?
Target: You want to come back home as a hero, don't you?

Source: You can't stop here... You must move forward!
Target: You can't stop here... You must move forward!

Source: Hahaha, you're getting better too, aren't you?
Target: Hahaha, you're getting better too, aren't you?

Source: That's no good, no one'll get fired up from that.
Target: That's no good, no one'll get fired up from that.

Source: You need to heat up more.
Target: You need to heat up more.

Source: Weren't you allergic to pollen, Riki?
Target: Weren't you allergic to pollen, Riki?

Source: A weak ball comes from a weak heart.
Target: A weak ball comes from a weak heart.

Source: Are you getting used to it yet?
Target: Are you getting used to it yet?

Source: What are you anxious about? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: What are you anxious about? It's clear from the way you bat.

Source: I won't let this one go.
Target: I won't let this one go.

Source: This is not bad at all.
Target: This is not bad at all.

Source: That was no sweat at all.
Target: That was no sweat at all.

Source: That was like the buzz of a mosquito.
Target: That was like the buzz of a mosquito.

Source: This catch is proof of our bonds!
Target: This catch is proof of our bonds!

Source: What's wrong? Run out of steam already, huh?
Target: What's wrong? Run out of steam already, huh?

Source: Did you start worrying about hair loss? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: Did you start worrying about hair loss? It's clear from the way you bat.

Source: Are you worried about the millennium bug now, of all times? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: Are you worried about the millennium bug now, of all times? It's clear from the way you bat.

Source: Are you that hungry? It's clear from the way you bat.
Target: Are you that hungry? It's clear from the way you bat.

Target: Are you that thirsty? It's clear from the way you bat.

Source: I caught that all too easy.
Target: I caught that all too easy.

Source: Come on, put some spirit into it...
Target: Come on, put some spirit into it...

Source: Haha, not bad at all. Keep at it.
Target: Haha, not bad at all. Keep at it.

Target: Did coming here launch your rebellious period? It's clear from the way you bat.

Target: Have you fallen in love? It's clear from the way you bat.

Source: You need to exercise diligence daily.
Target: You need to exercise diligence daily.

Source: Good, hit another one, hit another one with all your might!
Target: Good, hit another one, hit another one with all your might!

Target: Oops, did I catch that naivety of yours?

Target: Are you mad about something? It's clear from the way you bat.

Source: Oh, you sure are hard to handle.
Target: Oh, you sure are hard to handle.

Source: It's exactly as you say. You stand correct.
Target: It's exactly as you say. You stand correct.

Target: Hit this if you think you can...

Target: Mon Petit for everyone, once this is over.

Target: I wonder if there's any Mon Petit left...

Source: How can you guys be so cute?
Target: How can you guys be so cute?

Target: Riki, why don't you turn into a cat sometime too?

Target: Riki, did something good happen to you?

Target: Riki, did something bad happen to you?

Target: I wonder if I should go on a diet...

Target: If I suddenly say I used to be a total motorcycle rider, will that make people laugh?

Target: I seem to have gone unnoticed...

Target: Not that I'm feeling envious or anything...

Target: Riki-kun, you're more manly than I thought...

Target: I'm rooting for you from the back, Riki-kun.

Target: Muscles are passing by! Bulky muscles are passing by!

Target: Muscles are passing by! Quite some muscles are passing by!

Target: This is Enormous Muscles, heading out to the site now.

Target: Hu... hu... my muscles are screaming! They're screaming out!

Target: Uoooo, my muscles are running wild! They're rioting!

Target: The most important thing is team play.
